article_title: Q&A: Richard Pan talks about Senate race, affirmative action
article_text: Assemblyman Richard Pan is facing fellow Sacramento Democratic Assemblyman Roger Dickinson this fall in the state Senate race to replace Senate leader Darrell Steinberg. With the legislative session in its final days and the Nov. 4 election looming, Pan sat down Monday with The Sacramento Bee’s Capitol Bureau.

article_metadata.title: Q&A: Richard Pan talks about Senate race, affirmative action | The Sacramento Bee
